item.title: New module: system/libgnomecanvas version 2.30.3
item.description: Library for the GNOME canvas, an engine for structured graphics that offers a rich imaging model, high performance rendering, and a powerful, high-level API.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/libart_lgpl version 2.3.21
item.description: Libart is a library for high-performance 2D graphics.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: chemistry/ssm version 1.4
item.description: A macromolecular superposition library.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: chemistry/clipper version 2.1.20180802
item.description: Crystallographic automation and complex data manipulation libraries.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/fftw version 2.1.5
item.description: The Fastest Fourier Transform in the West (FFTW) is a software library for computing discrete Fourier transforms (DFTs).
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: chemistry/mmdb2 version 2.0.20
item.description: A C++ toolkit for working with macromolecular coordinate files.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/librsvg version 2.36.4
item.description: Librsvg is a library to render SVG files using cairo as a rendering engine.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/libcroco version 0.6.13
item.description: Libcroco is a standalone css2 parsing and manipulation library.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/rust version 1.56.1
item.description: A language empowering everyone to build reliable and efficient software.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/libtree version 2.0.0
item.description: libtree prints shared object dependencies as a tree.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/py-topaz version 0.2.4_py36
item.description: A pipeline for particle detection in cryo-electron microscopy images using convolutional neural networks trained from positive and unlabeled examples.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/py-tensorflow version 2.6.2_py36
item.description: TensorFlowâ„¢ is an open source software library for numerical computation using data flow graphs.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/gsl version 2.7
item.description: The GNU Scientific Library (GSL) is a numerical library for C and C++ programmers. The library provides a wide range of mathematical routines such as random number generators, special functions and least-squares fitting.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/restic version 0.12.1
item.description: Fast, secure, efficient backup program.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/gstreamer version 1.12.0
item.description: GStreamer is a library for constructing graphs of media-handling components.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/mrtrix version 3.0.3
item.description: MRtrix3 provides a set of tools to perform various types of diffusion MRI analyses, from various forms of tractography through to next-generation group-level analyses.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/nodejs version 16.13.0
item.description: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine. It provides the npm package manager.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/cuda version 11.5.0
item.description: CUDA is a parallel computing platform and application programming interface (API) model created by Nvidia. It allows software developers and software engineers to use a CUDA-enabled graphics processing unit (GPU) for general purpose processing.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/remora version 1.8.5
item.description: Remora is a tool to monitor runtime resource utilization.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/py-mageck version 0.5.9.4_py36
item.description: Model-based Analysis of Genome-wide CRISPR-Cas9 Knockout (MAGeCK) is a computational tool to identify important genes from the recent genome-scale CRISPR-Cas9 knockout screens technology.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/libiconv version 1.16
item.description: libiconv is a conversion library for string encoding.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/regenie version 2.2.4
item.description: regenie is a C++ program for whole genome regression modelling of large genome-wide association studies.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/powershell version 7.1.5
item.description: PowerShell Core is a cross-platform automation and configuration tool/framework.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/afni version 21.3.00
item.description: AFNI (Analysis of Functional NeuroImages) is a set of C programs for processing, analyzing, and displaying functional MRI (FMRI) data - a technique for mapping human brain activity.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/knitro version 12.4.0
item.description: Artelys Knitro is an optimization solver for difficult large-scale nonlinear problems.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/nvhpc version 21.7
item.description: NVIDIA HPC Software Development Kit (SDK) including C, C++, and Fortran compilers.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/cuda version 11.4.1
item.description: CUDA is a parallel computing platform and application programming interface (API) model created by Nvidia. It allows software developers and software engineers to use a CUDA-enabled graphics processing unit (GPU) for general purpose processing.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: physics/libgdsii version 0.21
item.description: libGDSII C++ is a library and command-line utility for reading GDSII geometry files.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/libevent version 2.1.12
item.description: The libevent API provides a mechanism to execute a callback function when a specific event occurs on a file descriptor or after a timeout has been reached.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/libctl version 4.5.0
item.description: libctl is a library for supporting flexible control files in scientific simulations.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: chemistry/gromacs version 2021.3
item.description: GROMACS is a versatile package to perform molecular dynamics, i.e. simulate the Newtonian equations of motion for systems with hundreds to millions of particles.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/proot version 5.2.0
item.description: PRoot is a user-space implementation of chroot, mount --bind, and binfmt_misc.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)
